Introducing TrainerHunt.

A premier marketplace of professional trainers.

We want professional trainers who are keen to be seen. If that is you, then you will want to…

Publish your training evaluation

Consolidate your training reviews and feedbacks for others to see how good you really are at what you do.

Build Credibility and Personal Branding

Nothing builds your credibility better than a third party validation. Use the reviews to market yourself and justify your value to customers.

Look for continuous personal growth

Trainers should be consumers of their own industry. Keep track of your personal growth. Record the trainings you attend. Show the world that you are regularly upgrading yourself to be a better trainer.

Get spotted by thousands of potential prospects

TrainerHunt is the best resource in the market to date that serves as a reference for companies to identify their ideal trainer for their training needs. Be visible to future prospects.
